Package fr.internetcartographier.model.geolocationservice

Class GeoIP2

java.lang.Object
fr.internetcartographier.model.geolocationservice.GeoIP2
All Implemented Interfaces:
GeolocationService
public class GeoIP2 extends Object implements GeolocationService
The GeoIP2 class implements the GeolocationService interface to provide geolocation data based on IP addresses using the GeoIP2 database. It follows the singleton pattern to ensure a single instance of the service.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static GeolocationService getInstance() throws Exception
      Retrieves the singleton instance of the GeoIP2 service. If an instance does not exist, a new one is created and returned.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of the GeoIP2 service.
      Throws:
      Exception - If there is an error initializing the GeoIP2 service.

      Returns the name of the GeoIP2 service.

    • getGeolocationData

      public Optional<GeolocationData> getGeolocationData(IPAddress ipAddress)
      Retrieves geolocation data for the given IP address using the GeoIP2 database.
      Specified by:
      getGeolocationData in interface GeolocationService
      Parameters:
      ipAddress - The IP address for which geolocation data is requested.
      Returns:
      An optional containing the geolocation data, or empty if an error occurs during retrieval.
